duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and assist customers, take drink orders, and process payments efficiently.
Work in the drive-thru and provide a high level of service to customers.
Guide the customer experience and interact with each customer that visits the Restaurant.
Cross-train in various roles such as Certified Trainer, kitchen lead, prep cook, etc.
Adhere to proper safety procedures when handling and/or preparing food.
Clean tables, floors, and other areas of the Restaurant to maintain cleanliness standards.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (no experience required)
